[useEditorUiTheme](./ui.useeditoruitheme.md)

## useEditorUiTheme() function

React Hook for the theme of an editor UI component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useEditorUiTheme<K extends keyof EditorUiTheme>(
  key: K,
  createDefaultTheme: EditorUiThemeFactory<K>
): EditorUiTheme[K]
```

## Parameters

| Parameter          | Type                                                                  | Description                                                       |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| key                | K                                                                     | The editor UI component                                           |
| createDefaultTheme | [EditorUiThemeFactory](./ui.editoruithemefactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt; | The [factory](./ui.editoruithemefactory.md) for the default theme |

<b>Returns:</b>

[EditorUiTheme](./ui.editoruitheme.md)<!-- -->\[K\]

The current theme of the specified component
